text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump I am sure that your parents are so proud. These are jobs that were layoffs from covid19. You take credit for this? You have committed yourself to lie 100% for this president and never waiver. You think it's powerful but, shows exactly what type of person you are. Shameful.
